Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are at two large, black gates leading into the Allisk Manor.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive passes by the entrance to the Allisk Manor here and continues to the northwest and southeast. The gates have been locked for ages and no one knows how to get in, not that anyone has really tried, nor wanted to enter this place. It has been rumored to be haunted by every known spirit that was ever believed not to exist in the world.
